CancelSubscription.title: Don't want to continue?
CancelSubscription.success: Your cancellation request has been processed.
CancelSubscription.text: Your subscription will be canceled immediately, and you will lose access to all premium features.
CancelSubscription.text2: Please note that canceling your subscription will prevent any future charges, but you will still have access until the end of your billing cycle.
CancelSubscription.text3: Are you sure you want to proceed? This action cannot be undone, and you will need to resubscribe to regain access.
CancelSubscription.error: Unable to process your cancellation request. Please try again!
